Description:

Batman Arkham Origins - the third part in a series of Batman Arkham. It is a prequel and will unfold over several years before the events of the previous parts.

Batman Arkham Origins provide us with advanced Gotham , where the most dangerous criminals and supervillains have not yet managed to reach the summit , and Batman is young and not experienced . However , Batman will have to go through a turning point in his life, which will determine his future path , and turning to the Dark Knight . Players will meet with many important characters for the first time , and establish key relationships and attitudes
